80 int open_vivoe_daemon (char* deamon_name) {
81  int syslog = 0; /* change this if you want to use syslog */
82  /* print log errors to syslog or stderr */
83  if (syslog)
84  snmp_enable_calllog();
85  else
86  snmp_enable_stderrlog();
87  /* make us a agentx client. */
88  netsnmp_ds_set_boolean(NETSNMP_DS_APPLICATION_ID, NETSNMP_DS_AGENT_ROLE, 1);
89 
90  /* Before starting the agent, we should initialize the MIB's parameters
91  * from the configuration file vivoe-mib.conf
92  */
93  if ( init_mib_content() )
94  return EXIT_FAILURE;
95 
96  /* initialize the agent library */
97  init_agent(basename(deamon_name));
98 
99  /* initialize mib code here
100  * this is where we initialize each init_parameterOfMIB routine to be handle by the agent
101  */
102  init_deviceDesc();
103  init_deviceManufacturer();
104  init_devicePartNumber();
105  init_deviceSerialNumber();
106  init_deviceHardwareVersion();
107  init_deviceSoftwareVersion();
108  init_deviceFirmwareVersion();
109  init_deviceMibVersion();
110  init_deviceType();
111  init_deviceUserDesc();
112  init_ethernetIfNumber();
113  init_ethernetIfTable();
114  init_deviceNatoStockNumber();
115  init_deviceMode();
116  init_deviceReset();
117  init_channelNumber();
118  init_channelReset();
119  init_sap_multicast();
120  init_channelTable();
121  init_videoFormatNumber();
122  init_videoFormatTable();
123 
124  /*
125  *Now that streams for SP/SU have been loaded, close configuration file
126  */
127  close_mib_configuration_file( gkf_conf_file );
128 
129  /* openvivoe-demon will be used to read openvivoe-demon.conf files. */
130  g_debug("init SNMP");
131  init_snmp(basename(deamon_name));
132 
133  g_info("%s is up and running.", basename(deamon_name));
134  return EXIT_SUCCESS;
135 
136 }
137 
138 gboolean handle_snmp_request( void ){
139  agent_check_and_process(0); /* 0 == don't block */
140  return TRUE;
141 }
